import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Carousel, Button, Spinner, Alert } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { carouselAPI, aboutAPI } from '../services/api'; const Home = () => { const [carouselSlides, setCarouselSlides] = useState([]); const [aboutContent, setAboutContent] = useState({}); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { console.log('checkpoint 1 Home.js - Home page component mounted'); fetchHomeData(); }, []); const fetchHomeData = async () => { try { console.log('checkpoint 2 Home.js - Fetching home page data...'); setLoading(true); setError(null); const [carouselResponse, aboutResponse] = await Promise.all([ carouselAPI.getSlides().catch(err => { console.warn('checkpoint 3 Home.js - Carousel API failed:', err.message); return { data: { data: [] } }; }), aboutAPI.getContent().catch(err => { console.warn('checkpoint 4 Home.js - About API failed:', err.message); return { data: { data: {} } }; }) ]); console.log('checkpoint 5 Home.js - Home data fetched successfully'); setCarouselSlides(carouselResponse.data.data || []); setAboutContent(aboutResponse.data.data || {}); } catch (error) { console.error('checkpoint 6 Home.js - Error fetching home data:', error); setError('Failed to load home page content. Please try again later.'); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; if (loading) { return (
Loading...

); } return (

{error && ( setError(null)}> {error} )} {carouselSlides.length > 0 ? ( {carouselSlides.map((slide, index) => (

{slide.title || 'Welcome to Genesis School'}

{slide.description || 'Empowering Young Minds for a Better Tomorrow'}

))} ) : (

{/* About Preview */}

About Genesis School

Genesis School is an educational institution designed to provide learning spaces and learning environments for the teaching of students under the direction of dedicated teachers.

Life at Genesis centres on a shared commitment to academic excellence, intellectual growth, art, athletics, high standards of ethical awareness, sportsmanship, and community service.

{/* Features */}

Why Choose Genesis School

We provide the best education and facilities for your child's growth
💻
Smart Classes

Modern smart classrooms with digital learning tools and interactive whiteboards.

🚌
Transport Facility

Safe and reliable transport service with GPS tracking and trained drivers.

🔬
Science Labs

Well-equipped science laboratories for hands-on learning and experimentation.

); }; export default Home;
